physical_appearance: The image shows four colour photographs. All of the photogrpahs feature groups of people. The ones in the front are sitting down while the ones at the back are standing up. The ladies in the photographs are wearing their ethnic Peranakan costumes, while the men are wearing suits and ties. All of them look towards the directions in which the photographs are captured.
sgcool_label_text: These four Chromogenic photographs on Fuji paper show the committee members of the Peranakan Association (2000).
title_text: Four photographs of the Peranakan Association committee members
subject_terms_2: Portrait photography Portraits, Group Peranakan Association, Singapore Peranakan (Asian people) Colour photography
